attributes.review: If i could leave a 0 star review on this app i would. I have been on this app for a very long time and recently have been receiving videos of myself using this app from unknown numbers that have hacked into my cameras and recorded me. this app steals data and watches you when you least expect it. DONT DOWNLOAD IT UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE WATCHED
